channel.title: Respawning marines on first map of Surface Tension
channel.description: The marines can respawn on the first map of Surface Tension. To do this, open and close the large door that you start the chapter behind using the keypad. Each time the door opens, more marines will spawn in the first area.

item.title: Respawning marines on first map of Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: skagra2
item.description:
The marines can respawn on the first map of Surface Tension. To do this, open and close the large door that you start the chapter behind using the keypad. Each time the door opens, more marines will spawn in the first area.
